languages.text: Потакание тщеславию Адептус Администратум возможно через строительство летающего дворца, полного услужливых серфов и изысканных наслаждений. Смягченные взяткой скрипторы будут особенно внимательны к желаниям Вольного Торговца.

The Adeptus Administratum's vanity may be indulged through the construction of a floating palace filled with helpful serfs and exquisite pleasures. Mollified by the bribe, the scribes will be especially attentive to the Rogue Trader's wishes.
languages.original_text: Потакание тщеславию Адептус Администратум возможно через строительство летающего дворца, полного услужливых серфов и изысканных наслаждений. Смягченные взяткой скрипторы будут особенно внимательны к желаниям Вольного Торговца.

The Adeptus Administratum's vanity may be indulged through the construction of a floating palace filled with helpful serfs and exquisite pleasures. Mollified by the bribe, the scribes will be especially attentive to the Rogue Trader's wishes.

languages.text: Il est possible de flatter la vanité de l'Adeptus Administratum en construisant un palais flottant rempli de serfs prévenants et offrant des plaisirs exquis. Amadoués par le pot-de-vin, les scribes seront particulièrement attentifs aux souhaits {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum's vanity may be indulged through the construction of a floating palace filled with helpful serfs and exquisite pleasures. Mollified by the bribe, the scribes will be especially attentive to the Rogue Trader's wishes.

traits.locale_text: Il est possible de flatter la vanité de l'Adeptus Administratum en construisant un palais flottant rempli de serfs prévenants et offrant des plaisirs exquis. Amadoués par le pot-de-vin, les scribes seront particulièrement attentifs aux souhaits {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: 帝国行政局の虚栄心は、有用な農奴や極上の快楽で満たされた浮遊宮殿を建設することで満たされるだろう。賄賂をもらっておとなしくなった書記官は、ローグトレーダーの希望に目を向けるようになるだろう。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum's vanity may be indulged through the construction of a floating palace filled with helpful serfs and exquisite pleasures. Mollified by the bribe, the scribes will be especially attentive to the Rogue Trader's wishes.

traits.locale_text: 帝国行政局の虚栄心は、有用な農奴や極上の快楽で満たされた浮遊宮殿を建設することで満たされるだろう。賄賂をもらっておとなしくなった書記官は、ローグトレーダーの希望に目を向けるようになるだろう。

languages.text: 建造一座配备高级仆役与奢华享受的浮游宫殿，可以满足帝国内政部那些虚荣的官员。那些被糖衣炮弹打倒的缮写员会特别留意行商浪人提出的任何要求。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum's vanity may be indulged through the construction of a floating palace filled with helpful serfs and exquisite pleasures. Mollified by the bribe, the scribes will be especially attentive to the Rogue Trader's wishes.

traits.locale_text: 建造一座配备高级仆役与奢华享受的浮游宫殿，可以满足帝国内政部那些虚荣的官员。那些被糖衣炮弹打倒的缮写员会特别留意行商浪人提出的任何要求。

languages.text: La vanidad del Adeptus Administratum puede satisfacerse mediante la construcción de un palacio flotante repleto de siervos y placeres exquisitos. Apaciguados por el soborno, los escribas serán especialmente atentos respecto a la voluntad d{mf|el|e la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum's vanity may be indulged through the construction of a floating palace filled with helpful serfs and exquisite pleasures. Mollified by the bribe, the scribes will be especially attentive to the Rogue Trader's wishes.

traits.locale_text: La vanidad del Adeptus Administratum puede satisfacerse mediante la construcción de un palacio flotante repleto de siervos y placeres exquisitos. Apaciguados por el soborno, los escribas serán especialmente atentos respecto a la voluntad d{mf|el|e la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Die Eitelkeit des Adeptus Administratum kann durch den Bau eines schwebenden Palastes voller hilfreicher Sklaven und exquisiter Vergnügungen befriedigt werden. Von der Bestechung besänftigt werden die Schreiber sich ganz besonders aufmerksam um die Wünsche {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} kümmern.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum's vanity may be indulged through the construction of a floating palace filled with helpful serfs and exquisite pleasures. Mollified by the bribe, the scribes will be especially attentive to the Rogue Trader's wishes.

traits.locale_text: Die Eitelkeit des Adeptus Administratum kann durch den Bau eines schwebenden Palastes voller hilfreicher Sklaven und exquisiter Vergnügungen befriedigt werden. Von der Bestechung besänftigt werden die Schreiber sich ganz besonders aufmerksam um die Wünsche {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} kümmern.

languages.text: Adeptus Administratum'un kibri, eli iş tutan köleler ve enfes sefalarla dolu bir yüzer sarayın inşasıyla tatmin edilebilir. Rüşvetten hoşnut kalan kâtipler, Hür Tacir'in arzularını hususi bir dikkatle değerlendirecektir.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Administratum's vanity may be indulged through the construction of a floating palace filled with helpful serfs and exquisite pleasures. Mollified by the bribe, the scribes will be especially attentive to the Rogue Trader's wishes.
